website_summaries.verdict: This affordable option gives you a wide variety of options in terms of barrel size and look.
pros: Your choice of several sizes, 1 liter to 5 liters, as well as several different hoop types such as black steel and silver
Barrel comes with a wooden stand, bung, cork, barrel wax, paper funnel, and instructions
Links to a 30-page recipe booklet on their website
cons: Some buyers point to durability issues in the form of leaks and cracks that develop over several months
Reports of this option having a strong chemical/adhesive smell

customer_reviews.title: Wood Dispenser Cracked and Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed, followed the instructions exactly, but the wood in the dispenser cracked after aging for 3 weeks and leaked everywhere. I was looking forward to sharing some barrel aged old fashions for a holiday family gathering and it didn't work out because the product was defective and there was no saving it. Not only am I out the money for the barrel, but the expense for the ingredients I was aging too.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Broken spigot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these barrels as a first father’s day gift. The spigot continuously leaks. I emailed and phoned the company asking them where I could purchase a spigot, and they never replied. We are still using the barrel but constantly need to keep a small cup underneath of it. I’m sure this was just an unfortunate one time thing, as the barrel is beautiful,although we are disappoint :(
customer_reviews.author: Samantha mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Leaked/Absorbed ?? Gone.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the greatest idea ever! My husband and I used it as a Unity ceremony at our wedding and hoped to drink our aged whiskey at our 1st anniversary- the thing was basically empty after 2 months. There was no puddle or residue where it sat, I have no idea what happened to the whiskey. About a half cup was inside. We followed the instructions and soaked it, not sure what the deal is. The bottom of the barrel is dark like it absorbed It. Sad for us. Not recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was my second barrel and, while the first one was perfect, this one continues to leak like a sieve from the end. I followed the instructions, used the wax to try to seal the leaks and even bought more wax to remedy the issue. I understand that there can occasionally be a “bad barrel.” But having tried to contact customer service on multiple occasions over the last 2 month without any response whatsoever is unacceptable. Thus my 1 star review and recommendation that you find another vendor. Hopefully they pay more attention to their reviews than their customer service email address.
customer_reviews.author: GLS3105

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and used
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived used and damaged! Huge crack in barrel with wine or bourbon stain seeping out from it!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Carroccio

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product. I purchased both a one liter and two liter. I followed the instructions and no leak issues. In a temp controlled environment I filled the one and two liter with scotch. After 6 months with no leaking, all the scotch is gone. Not sure what I did wrong but this was an expensive and very disappointing experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy quality control, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the curing directions exactly, applied wax where needed, and had no leaks for a few months! Then one of the staves warped and/or rotted through, and the whole barrel emptied. On closer inspection of the failed stave, it was factory-charred more than 50% of the way through, and had hardly any structural wood straight from the manufacturer. I tried to contact the seller about repair/replacement, but never got an answer. Thoroughly dissatisfied with the product's usability, but at least it makes for a good decorative item.
customer_reviews.author: jiingo

customer_reviews.title: This is junk
customer_reviews.text: Followed all of the instructions for prep, then filled this with bourbon. Checked it about a month later & found that some bourbon had evaporated or possibly leaked out. Checked it again a few months later & it’s completely empty. All of the bourbon evaporated. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product, high quality and trouble free
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product, high quality and trouble free. Having read many reviews and doing research as I'm sure many of you have, this product lived up to expectations and was delivered in perfect condition. It literally leaked only a bit at the top and bottom and then immediately swelled and sealed as it should have after conditioning with boiled, filtered water. Very well made and I will be buying several more. These guys clealry care a lot about the quality of the product they make. I'm very happy with my purchase and will be buying several more in various sizes.
customer_reviews.author: The Dals

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, not remotely what you think a oak mini barrel should be
customer_reviews.text: So far no leaks, but the barrel was filled with sawdust and a dozen 1-2" long splinters. I spent over an hour just tweezing out splinters and then flushing out the saw dust. It was also covered in some weird lacquer, there's gobs of glue sealing the head. I really question whether drinking anything aged in this barrel would be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Watson Chotimongkol

customer_reviews.title: I paid $10 more to get the option of having ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid $10 more to get the option of having the barrel engraved. It never gave me a template or anything to have the engraving option. When I put it in the cart it wouldn't let me do any customizing at all. So I paid $10 more and got a plain Barrel basically. The battles okay.
customer_reviews.author: Ron F.

customer_reviews.title: Not built for longevity!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever left a 1 Star. The product was filled and enjoyed for the first batch. The second time it was filled I noticed it was slowly spilling out of the bottom. The bottom of the wood warped and now was leaking. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: joseph maltese

customer_reviews.title: Leakage
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up in pristine condition and I wasted no time preparing it for use. The construction appeared to be far better than the barrel I purchased in 2014. But only after I mounted a plaque on the front of it with adhesive tape did I learn about some leaking issues. Using the barrel wax, I was able to stop some of the leaks but as you can see from the picture I can not seem to stop the final leak. The plaque is fixed using double sided tape so the barrels integrity is intact. I cured the barrel twice and followed the instructions verbatim. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: william potts

customer_reviews.title: This was supposed to be a surprise for my boyfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a surprise for my boyfriend who loves rum. It came with no hole in the side for pouring and the spout was not attached (obviously - there's no hole for it to be attached to!) I thought this was odd so I asked a question on the product page, and sure enough, it was confirmed that I received a faulty barrel. I live outside of the US and had it shipped to a friend on my last visit, where I picked it up. It'll be an extreme hassle and headache to send it back now, so I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 years ago. I used it to make a negroni, which came out great. I did experience some leaks, but not all too bad. I was just getting it ready to clean out (water) and water was just spilling all over the place. I use that useless piece of wax to cover up what I could. It didn't do much, of course, and there are just too many holes. It's not worth it. I'm going to look for a better brand to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: V. S.

customer_reviews.title: This barrel sucks
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful. After ordering this, and following all of the instructions, the barrel was not properly sealed, and leaked bourbon all over my cabinet. With as many options as there are on Amazon, consider another option. I would award zero stars if presented with the option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many oak barrels and after reading many reviews I purchased from Golden Oak. I received my barrel and following the directions everything worked as described in the directions. At first after filling the barrel with water, it leaked just like described but after a day all the leaks stoped and I have a perfect barrel ready for whatever comes next. I was also impressed with their customer service. I was worried about the spigot and sent an email to Golden Oak. I received a response within a day and sent pictures of my worry and within 2 days I received a replacement. Excellent work Golden Oak! I would buy from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Bottesch

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for a beginner. I bought it for my hubby for fathers day and he loves it. I was concerned with sealing it based on a few reviews but the first time worked like a charm. No leaks or issues at all. The instructions were emailed to me and even included some recipes. It is smaller than I expected but 2 Liters isnt that much in retrospect. So I got exactly what I paid for. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: BARRETT

customer_reviews.title: They Leak
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several barrels in the past. Both leaked even after proper soaking overnight, trashed both and will not buy from this particular company again.
customer_reviews.author: John Razumich

customer_reviews.title: Leaky barrels
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two barrels and very carefully followed the written instructions and watched all of the videos. The barrels took about a week to cure, and one required a wax patch. When I filled them with whiskey they began to leak between the slats again, eventually leaking until the barrels were empty. I provided photos to customer service and they promised to replace the barrels. But it's been a couple months now and despite some follow-up messages I'm still empty-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemingly good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good barrel. Ordinarily, I would wait until I have had some experience with a product before reviewing, but I keep getting requests from the seller for a review. I made one batch in the barrel. It did not leak and the batch was tasty. (I have found with these barrels, it takes a few batches to find the right recipe and to age the barrel a bit). So, no complaints about the barrel or the packaging. No reason to think this will not be satsfactory once I have some experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Darbelob

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely pay $7-10 more for a better quality barrel with engravings from another company
customer_reviews.text: The barrel leaks from day 1 and even after 4 days of soaking. I tried to seal it with wax and it is still leaking. My brother bought a barrel from another company and it is not leaking at all. I would not buy from this company. I should have listen to all the reviews. I would definitely pay $7-10 more for a better quality barrel with engravings from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Really cool barrel. Be warned that the first couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool barrel. Be warned that the first couple of uses results in a VERY strong wood taste that destroys the alcohol you put in. I was using Tequila in mine and it wasn't until the 3rd batch that it was even drinkable. After that though it really does a great job. In the end I would have been better off just paying for the expensive oak barrel aged tequila I was trying to replicate. Neat conversation piece though.
customer_reviews.author: Razorwoods

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: barrel still leaks after prepping following instructions from manufacturer Cute concept but not ideal
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s fine - not fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd 2L barrel. Overall it’s fine - not fantastic. I find that it doesn’t fit a full 2L of liquid. Both of mine fit around 1.85-1.9ML...not a huge deal. Both spouts leak a few drops a day, enough to require paper towels under them. Make sure you disassemble and clean the spout. Mine had glue/gunk in there and two small metal shards from where the hole was drilled.
customer_reviews.author: brazenbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Filled the barrel with water and two (2) hours later emptied and filled with a whiskey that could not be described as expensive or terribly complex. Decanted a week and a half later ...
customer_reviews.text: Barrel, stand, spigot and cork came as described. All packaged securely and no damage when I opened the box. Filled the barrel with water and two (2) hours later emptied and filled with a whiskey that could not be described as expensive or terribly complex. Decanted a week and a half later and started my second batch with a bottled in bond bourbon. The younger barrels impart flavor and smooth out the whiskey very quickly. I will probably need to age each succesive batch a bit longer than the previous. All in all very satisfied with the Barrel from Golden Oak Barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely constructed little barrel
customer_reviews.text: Barrel is exactly as advertised. It appears to be good quality and mine did not leak at all, even before soaking it. It comes with a small paper funnel which made filling it easy. 2 liters is quite a small barrel that easily fits on a shelf in my kitchen cabinets. I'm currently aging some Jim Beam to wear off the newly charred oak and then it's on to barrel-aged whiskey cocktails. Beats paying $12+ at the craft cocktail bar. This thing will easily pay for itself.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a great rum barrel and great price.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packaged, the oak and brass hoops are of great quality. Very fast shipping. Soon as it arrived I filled with water to check for leaks and only found one, the leak had stopped in a couple of hours great craftsmanship 👍 I'll give this company AAA+++ This will make a great rum barrel, I filled it with pusser's rum!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scuba038

customer_reviews.title: great little barrel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little barrel. I had no leaks at all. When the water did not come out from the spigot, I thought it was because it was blocked by wood fragments still connected around the edges. Cleaned those off with a knife and still the water did not come out.... Duh? You have to take out the nice little air blocking bung at the top and it flows perfectly. Right now I'm using it for wine vinegar but I bet my daughters would like to age some spirits.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: China grade product
customer_reviews.text: thought this would be a cool thing to try. After I installed the nozzle it would leak. I thought maybe it wasn't in all the way but it was. tried to hammer it in a little more and it split the wood. so Now I guess I have a 55 dollar decoration. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this purchase. The owner of the company sent me a personal e-mail to ensure the product arrived in good condition and check to see if I had any questions or concerns. Great customer service. Would definitely recommend. Does a fine job of aging whiskey, looks great on a home bar, and is a fun conversation piece. Just follow the instructions and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get the barrel to seal. There is a knot on one of the staves that continues to leak dispite trying to “cure” the barrel with water for many weeks. Have not heard back from their customer service. Disappointed that whoever built the barrel would have used a knotted stave. Poor QC.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sigurdsson

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal.
customer_reviews.text: Did not seal, even after multiple attempts conditioning. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kim reece

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait....
customer_reviews.text: Sealed up well and now I'm waiting on the deliciousness inside. Well built with minimal leaking during priming. Swelled up nice and tight. Bunghole got tight but now it's perfect. Tap looks rudimentary but functions well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Barrel is varnished not just the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled that the barrel is varnished. I expected a charred raw wood barrel and a varnished stand. Putting varnish on the barrel stops the wood and what’s inside from breathing. That is the whole point of barrel aging.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product! Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Father’s Day gift for my pops. He absolutely loves it! He let the barrel season with some Johnny Walker Blue, and it did not disappoint. Blue, is already smooth. But using this barrel, mellowed it even further. I really was impressed with this overall. For the money, you won’t find anything better. Now I need to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Chisare

customer_reviews.title: Leaky but Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful and delivered in a timely manner but it was not delivered with the 30 page aging guide. In addition I have cured this per the instructions and it has been leaking substantially for over 5 days. Really sad as I was doing to fill it with wine and give it as a wedding gift this weekend and I don't have enough time to replace and cure another one.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and sturdy little barrel
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy little barrel. A little smaller than what my imagination made it out to be, but is is still a high quality piece. Can't wait for my mini batch of scotch to finish so I can utilise the natural oak flavors.
customer_reviews.author: lonedemon

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: The particular barrel I got was defective and leaked constantly during the water curing process. I have had other barrels and this never happened. It leaked so much the metal rims came away from the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: margiemic

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service, bad product
customer_reviews.text: All of the metal rings on this barrel split at the rivet once full of water. Company was unresponsive via both email and phone, leaving me with a useless busted barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and I am so happy with the barrel. The customer service of all the staff members is equally as great as the product. They are very quick to respond and all of them have been nothing but helpful, from assuring me my package would arrive by a certain date to giving a few recipes to try. While being very professional, it felt like two old friends catching up when I called and spoke with Courtney. Will definitely be referring friends to golden oak barrel due to the quality of their barrels and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: followed instructions and it was an easy setup and prep ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product.....followed instructions and it was an easy setup and prep ....now waiting to see if the bourbon matures as advertised.....will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe this is the sweet spot for small barrels
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these Golden Oak barrels in various sizes. This is the only one that hasn't had "problems". Maybe this is the sweet spot for small barrels? Great construction on this one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This item replaced a barrel from a different seller that was horrible. I lost an entire batch of gin due to failure of other. This one never had any leaks and is currently holding whiskey. I appreciate the video instructions.
customer_reviews.author: N. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, just make sure you follow the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, just make sure you follow the instructions and soak it with water before using it to let the wood swell before you start aging something. Also make sure you rinse the inside well to get out any splinters.
customer_reviews.author: tom jenkins

customer_reviews.title: The size you order
customer_reviews.text: For years I have seen these Barrels at various times and places, they are very authentic and well made. Be sure of the size you order you will not be disappointed. Customer service is outstanding, I will purchase another only bigger next time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Majuri

customer_reviews.title: Did kind of expect a little better for price but overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Price is OK except packaging needs work the stand came cracked and broken and the barrel leaked little more than anticipated even after almost two days of prep. Luckily I took wood shop in high school and fixed most problems. Did kind of expect a little better for price but overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Your Mom

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself bourbon
customer_reviews.text: awesome made in the USA product. A great novelty. Miniature bourbon casks that function the same way as their full-size counterpart. Their customer service is on point, the shipping is fast, and it really works to turn your shine into bourbon. Any problems? just send them an e mail them, customer satisfaction is very important to them. I will definitely be doing more business with golden oak barrel!
customer_reviews.author: El Guapo

customer_reviews.title: great for whiskey
customer_reviews.text: no leaks and looks great. adds some oaky flavor too, but not a ton. just follow the instructions. mine had a slow leak for about 30 minutes initially, but once the wood swelled up it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: David M Buckholz

customer_reviews.title: The 1 liter Barrel is good quality and looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The 1 liter Barrel is good quality and looks just like the picture. It had one very minor leak that sealed itself in just a few minutes after filling with water. I rinsed it several times to get all the debris out and had it filled with whisky within an hour of taking it out of the box. Whisky has been in for three weeks and no leaks have occurred. Looking forward to my first tasting soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tillery

customer_reviews.title: The rum was great. I am now trying a whiskey
customer_reviews.text: I had received the barrel and followed the instruction on sealing the leaks, which took about 2 hours and the wax which was included. I put some spirits inside with some rum essence. and kept it for about 2 weeks. The rum was great. I am now trying a whiskey. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Required only 2 hours of prep, saw only 2 drops of liquid before the barrel adjusted properly. Charred, well made, great price, and great quality. I will most certainly be buying from Golden Oak Barrel again.
customer_reviews.author: Giuliana

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks in and the Negroni and Manhattan are mellowing and picking up a nice smokey flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of the 3 liter barrels and and both are filled and aging cocktails. Two weeks in and the Negroni and Manhattan are mellowing and picking up a nice smokey flavor. Make sure you fill with water first and let the wood swell up to prevent leaks. Looking forward to aging Gin next.
customer_reviews.author: robert ellwood

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After using it 2 times it just leaks and I’m not able to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a whiskey drinker!
customer_reviews.text: The whiskey barrel arrived promptly and was well packaged. It is just as the picture shows and is well made and sturdy. We filled the barrel as instructed (it does not leak) and now are awaiting the finished product. It’s a very novel gift!
customer_reviews.author: AH191

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing liquor
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sturdy and well made. Bought to age Brazilian cacasha! Would I but again? Yes! Would I recommend to a friend definitely!
customer_reviews.author: N.Daulton

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a lot. Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Leaked a bunch the first time I put anything in it. Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hines

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This oak barrel is small, 1 liter, however; very attractive and made well. I followed instructions before use and had no leaks whew who!! I have apple cider vinegar in it now. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria F.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: If you have a person who is hard to buy for, this might be your answer. I have given a sever of these and people just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mannon

customer_reviews.title: Real Oak barrel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent barrel. Item is exactly as described. Just got it today and I've had it soaking for a couple hours and the barrel is starting to seal up pretty good. Can't wait to fill it! Recommend for anyone that wants a REAL oak barrel!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cool barrel...just waiting on results
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Whiskey Oak Barrel purchase so far. The craftsmanship of the barrel itself is very nice, and I had no problems testing it for leaks and preparing it to house my own blend of whiskey (the instructional video was very helpful). Still waiting to test the result of my experiment, but very happy with the barrel so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Rum on the way
customer_reviews.text: Sealed nicely and works perfectly. Now time will tell if the barrel was charred correctly. Very happy here with both the speedy delivery and wonderful packaging. Will purchase from again. My stand is different than pictured but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: vanilla fig vodka
customer_reviews.text: prepped barrel and had no leakage, put fresh figs and a vanilla bean in mason jar with vodka for a few weeks, then into the barrel for 2 more, almost completely eliminates the vodka burn, very smooth . will be experimenting again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Ozric

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This barrel (I bought the 2 L) is amazing. I had a little leakage when I first got it and put water in it and a little more after filling it with liquor but I'm pretty sure I didn't put the spigot in tight enough and that's my fault. It has far exceeded my expectations and I think it looks great on my counter. Well worth the money and it seems like it's built to last. I would highly recommend a purchase if you're even remotely thinking about buying.
customer_reviews.author: kyle Henricksen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Manhattans!
customer_reviews.text: Just tasted my 3 month old Manhattan out of this barrel. Really nice smooth taste. I mixed three different types of sweet vermouth with Bulliet burbon and put in temp and humidity controlled environment. Even my wife likes it and she is not too fond of Manhattans.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Merdon

customer_reviews.title: ... paid for a 2 liter revived a 1 liter nice barrel tho
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and paid for a 2 liter revived a 1 liter nice barrel tho. But not what I paid for or wanted and waited two weeks for it to be wrong
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a home brewer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the barrel for my friend who brews his own mead. He was super excited and loved the look of it. He filled it first with water them with 3 bottles of his mead, he said it leaked, but just barely (a drop a day) , for about three days but is now completely sealed and he is waiting anxiously to try the first run
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Stoddart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3 liter Oak Barrel as a gift for my husband and he loves it! He recently began brewing his own beer so this was a great addition to his new hobby. Barrel is great quality and after prepping as instructed there are no leaks. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the barrels.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two 1-liter barrels so I could age two batches of different liquors. The barrels were delivered quickly and were well protected during shipment. I am very pleased with the quality of the barrels, both sealed up quite nicely after only a few hours after filling with the room temperature water. They now are filled with liquor and I can't wait for the taste test in a few months. This is a good product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking!
customer_reviews.text: Had the same experience as some others. Went through the swelling process. After a bit it started leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with these little barrels and what they do for ...
customer_reviews.text: Received order fast, on time and undamaged. I am happy with these little barrels and what they do for the liquor they hold. I have bought three of them now and am sure that my bragging them up is about to sell a few more. This is a fantastic addition to my new hobby and would make a great gift idea for that hard to buy for person in your life who seems to have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rush

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this item as a birthday present for a family member. I must admit when I received the product, I was pleasantly surprised. It looked well built and true to its picture. I had no hesitation giving this as a gift. I knew the person receiving it would enjoy it and it looked great on his bar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Very happy with it, just read directions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The digital guide and how to videos were very helpful and it was easy for me to learn how to use my barrel
customer_reviews.text: My 1L barrel arrived quickly and was exactly as described online. The digital guide and how to videos were very helpful and it was easy for me to learn how to use my barrel. I loved the recipe guide and the step by step instructions. Also, my barrel sealed completely in about an hour. Very high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Nick Iannacone

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had made this purchase by mistake. I did end up returning it because of the mistake on my end. However, this product looks beautifully made and of great quality! I would highly recommend this as a gift or piece in your home. Absolutely beautiful craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be comparable to other barrels that cost more ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be comparable to other barrels that cost more. Obviously no way to know whether the interior was properly charred until I taste some liquor after I have "aged" it for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: dispoman

customer_reviews.title: Great barrels and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love these barrels!! Purchased a barrel as a Christmas gift (to myself) to age a bourbon concoction and loved it so much I just purchased another one. Following a shipping issue, which was promptly addressed, I can also say that their customer service is first rate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Barrel = Lost Liquor
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the barrel was slightly leaky through-out the aging process - hard to miss with Campari. I assumed this was inevitable with a small barrel, but was extremely disappointed in tasting the fruits of my labor when I realized that those leaks over five weeks added up than less than .5 ounces left of an initial contribution of 1 liter of a Negroni.
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions included
customer_reviews.text: Well made little oak barrel. Easy to follow instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broken stand
customer_reviews.text: The the stand was delivered broken... Not very pleased with the quality... Update----- Changing it to 5 star as their customer service department reached out and sent a replacement stand. I would definitely be buying another barrel in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: My first works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I can not get it to stop leaking. It’s been about 1 week after soaking it with water. After it swelled with water and the leaks stop. It keeps weeping with the whiskey in it. This is my second barrel. My first works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barrel
customer_reviews.text: This was the very first time I ever ordered a barrel for aging liquor. Hubby didn’t know what he was doing and broke the spigot. I contacted the company and they sent me 2 more free! Everything is working perfectly and no leaks! Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Angela E.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This barrel is very poor quality. Had many leaks when filled. Once the leaks were fixed and filled with alcohol one of the bands came off. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert George

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Without having filled it, found the construction to be excellent. Would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garsson

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in timely matter for my husband, BUT the base was broken when I opened the package. One of the sides is split down the middle and on if the dowels is completely broken into two pieces. The actual barrel at large chunks of wood inside that my husband had to fish out. Please be wary before purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the arm-chair liquor enthusiast.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty sweet. Looks just like it does in the picture and it’s actually built better than I thought it would. I put cheap silver tequila in mine and in just over a week it’s aging very well. I’m looking forward to seeing the finished product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They should label and give direction on thing's like this.
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 of the soaking process. The water stopped leaking so I put my alcohol in it and it starting leaking again. They sent a small bag of what appears to be wax? They should label and give direction on thing's like this.
customer_reviews.author: pin cushion 88

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product...
customer_reviews.text: Have read other comments saying it leaked. Follow the easy instructions on sealing the barrel and it won’t. This is a quality product and what it adds to a Negroni is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little barrel. Sealed up in a couple of hours. It's full of burbon now and I'll update in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size - small but fits a good amount of alcohol.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the amount of gin we will be making. The instructions were easy to understand. We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: palm springs

customer_reviews.title: Husband's birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: He loved this gift. He followed the directions before using it and had no issues whatsoever. He has recommended it to many of his whisky drinking buddies. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Knust

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product, has sealed nice and not leaking. Biggest issue was I ordered two barrels with copper bands, only received one with copper bands and one with black bands.
customer_reviews.author: Travis D. Book

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The barrel appears as advertised, was shipped very well wrapped and protected. I am very pleased. This is a Christmas gift so I will also add a note later once the barrel has been put to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kris in Mpls

customer_reviews.title: Great product - purchased this after a co-worker told me ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product - purchased this after a co-worker told me about barrel aging Manhattans. This is the perfect gift for someone who likes alcohol and likes to mix their own drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service..EVER! Had a minor issue that was corrected immediately. Love my barrel! Have it on my bar and everyone comments on it, they get even more excited when they see it's functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect to get me started with aging
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to get me started with aging. Will probably go with something larger next time. Looks great in my office and has a nice spout for pouring. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Barrels
customer_reviews.text: The Barrels are Great, and it's easy to set up. Love these Barrels
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & sealed up quick
customer_reviews.text: Followed direction videos to install spout and seal with water. Clear and easy to follow. The stand is a little crooked and wobbly when empty, but sits level once filled so it's a non issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: it seated fine and there was no leak
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give a higher rating until I see what the barrel does for my brandy. When I got the barrel, there was a small leak but after I filled it with water, it seated fine and there was no leak. All promises positive. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Trying a new way to make smoked bourbon manhattans!
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly, sealed up in couple days and now sits on the counter, filled, making smoked bourbon Manhattan. We'll see how well in couple months!
customer_reviews.author: Rooksroost

product_meta.title: 2 Liter Whiskey Oak Barrel for Aging – Golden Oak Barrel with Black Steel Hoops – Aging and Recipes Digital Guide included
product_meta.description:
FAQ- What happens if my barrel won't seal?

Oak like any other wood expands and contracts with heat. If your's doesn't seal right away thats ok. Just fill with water and give it an hour. If it still doesn't then contact us right away. 

We believe in the quality of products and each barrel is backed by a 365 day guarantee against leaks. Our barrels ship with an air tight seal and will still be air and water tight after the initial soaking and curing stages; if not send us a message and we will replace it. 
Oak is a special wood when it comes to making liquor because it is the only wood that does not rot due to liquid. A quality oak barrel like ours is 100% new oak and is meant to hold your liquor for up to 10 years or longer. 
Our barrels are a sense of pride for us and they should be for you too. We have barrels in different sizes, 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20 liters & can have Black Steel, Polished Steel or Brass for the metal hoops. 
Each barrel includes comes with a pre-installed Oak spigot with an aluminum valve, cork bung and a premium stand. Each stand has intricate bevels in the wood and is varnished to enhance the appearance along with metal rivets on one side and blank on the other so you can choose what fits you best. 
We also offer custom laser engraving on each barrel for an additional fee. This can be one of our many popular designs or one of your own. 
Each order includes access to our digital 30 page brewing guide which will take you from a novice to an expert so you can make the perfect liquor, spirits, or ale. 
We’re a small company that is proud of our product. Any questions let us know.
feature_bullets: 🥃 WHY AGE YOUR LIQUORS- Each Barrels uses the wood’s natural sugars and takes the drinks you enjoy and makes them into the drinks you'll love. Great for your Whiskey, Bourbon, Tequila, Rum, Wine and other Cocktails.
🥃 WHAT DO YOU GET- 2 Liter Oak Barrel with Black Steel Hoops, Wooden Stand with Rivets, Bung and Cork, Paper Funnel, Barrel Wax, and Instruction Card with link to our online 30 page recipe book.

🥃 HOW TO USE IN 4 EASY STEPS- 1. Fill your barrel with water for 2-7 days until the wood completely swells. 2. Empty the water from the barrel, rinse if needed and then add your favorite drink. 3. Let sit and sample every week until desired taste, remove from barrel and enjoy your new barrel aged drink. 4. Repeat process.

🥃 WHO IS THIS FOR- For the person who wants to bring their drinks to the next level, try some new flavors, or try a new hobby. People love getting these for Birthdays, Weddings, Appreciations, Celebrations and Holiday gifts.

🥃 THE STORY- Golden Oak Barrels are made by a team built on 4 generations of craftsman. What happens to our barrels when hands are the main tools is that they become precious, as each contains a little bit of the craftsman’s hard work and soul. If for any reason within the 90 day warranty there is a manufacturers defect we will happily replace your barrel to keep YOU our customers happy.
